00017 #include "MisrFileQuery.h"
00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 #include <mfhdf.h>
00020 #include <HdfEosDef.h>
00021 #include <stdlib.h>
00022 #include <string.h>
00023 
00039 MTKt_status MtkGridAttrList(
00040   const char *filename,    
00041   const char *gridname,    
00042   int *num_attrs,          
00043   char **attrlist[]         )
00044 {
00045   MTKt_status status_code; /* Return status of this function */
00046   MTKt_status status;      /* Return status */
00047   int32 hdfstatus;         /* HDF-EOS return status */
00048   int32 fid = FAIL;    /* HDF-EOS File id */
00049 
00050   if (filename == NULL)
00051     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00052 
00053   /* Open HDF File */
00054   fid = GDopen((char*)filename, DFACC_READ);
00055   if (fid == FAIL)
00056     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDOPEN_FAILED);
00057 
00058   /* Get list of grid attributes. */
00059   status = MtkGridAttrListFid(fid, gridname, num_attrs, attrlist);
00060   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00061 
00062   /* Close HDF file */
00063   hdfstatus = GDclose(fid);
00064   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00065     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDCLOSE_FAILED);
00066   fid = FAIL;
00067 
00068   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00069 
00070 ERROR_HANDLE:
00071   if (fid != FAIL)
00072     GDclose(fid);
00073 
00074   return status_code;
00075 }
00076 
00082 MTKt_status MtkGridAttrListFid(
00083   int32 fid,               
00084   const char *gridname,    
00085   int *num_attrs,          
00086   char **attrlist[]         )
00087 {
00088   MTKt_status status_code; /* Return status of this function */
00089   int32 hdfstatus;         /* HDF-EOS return status */
00090   int32 gid = FAIL;    /* HDF-EOS Grid id */
00091   int32 nattrs = 0;        /* Number of attributes */
00092   int32 count;
00093   char **attrlist_tmp = NULL;
00094   char *list = NULL;
00095   char *temp = NULL;
00096   int i;
00097 
00098   if (gridname == NULL || 
00099       num_attrs == NULL || attrlist == NULL)
00100     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00101 
00102   /* Attach to Grid */
00103   gid = GDattach(fid, (char*)gridname);
00104   if (gid == FAIL)
00105     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDATTACH_FAILED);
00106 
00107   /* Get buffer size */  
00108   hdfstatus = GDinqattrs(gid,NULL,&count);
00109   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00110     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDINQATTRS_FAILED);
00111 
00112   list = (char*)malloc((count + 1) * sizeof(char));
00113   if (list == NULL)
00114     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_MALLOC_FAILED);
00115 
00116   /* Get grid attributes */
00117   hdfstatus = nattrs = GDinqattrs(gid,list,&count);
00118   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00119     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDINQATTRS_FAILED);
00120 
00121   /* Detach from grid */
00122   hdfstatus = GDdetach(gid);
00123   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00124     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDDETACH_FAILED);
00125 
00126   attrlist_tmp = (char**)calloc(nattrs,sizeof(char*));
00127   if (attrlist_tmp == NULL)
00128     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_CALLOC_FAILED);
00129     
00130   temp = strtok(list,",");
00131   i = 0;
00132   while (temp != NULL)
00133   {
00134     attrlist_tmp[i] = (char*)malloc((strlen(temp) + 1) * sizeof(char));
00135     if (attrlist_tmp[i] == NULL)
00136       MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_MALLOC_FAILED);
00137     strcpy(attrlist_tmp[i],temp);
00138     temp = strtok(NULL,",");
00139     ++i;
00140   }
00141 
00142   free(list);
00143 
00144   *attrlist = attrlist_tmp;
00145   *num_attrs = nattrs;
00146 
00147   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00148 
00149 ERROR_HANDLE:
00150   if (attrlist_tmp != NULL)
00151     MtkStringListFree(nattrs, &attrlist_tmp);
00152 
00153   if (num_attrs != NULL)
00154     *num_attrs = -1;
00155 
00156   free(list);
00157   GDdetach(gid);
00158 
00159   return status_code;
00160 }
